Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: AGAddressCollectionSubmission - Proposed for Australian Government, Collections Projects
WellbeingPersonLink - Proposed for Vic DET
WellbeingResponse– SuspensionContainerType – SuspensionNotes added, Proposed by Vic DET
MapInfo/MapReference added MapNumber, Proposed by Vic DET
Attendance Codes Added for Vic and NSW DET
Additions to Wellbeing Medical Categories and Sub Categories, Proposed by Vic DET
Additions to StudentPersonal/MostRecent and StudentSchoolEnrollment for Future AG Census Collection
Addition to StaffStatus codes, Proposed by Vic DET
StudentPersonal/PrePrimaryEducationHours – type of attendance care prior to kinder enrolment values added, Proposed by NSW DET
Added RoomInfo/AvailableForTimeTable and StaffAssignment/AvailableForTimetable - Proposed by NSW DET, 3PI project
Update to CodeSet, Staff Activity (1107) Primary/Secondary Combined Teacher - Proposed by Sentral
SymptomList added to WellbeingCharacteristic, Proposed by Vic DET
Flag added for International Students for StudentSchoolEnrollment, Proposed by NSW DET
Education Level - Primary or Secondary, Associated with AG Student Collections
Pre-Primary Education Hours - added to support PrePrimaryEducationHours
Student Boarding Status - added to support AG Collections
SchoolCommonwealthId privacy rating changed to Low
Removed duplicate code ACDT, in TimeZone codeset
Changes to WellbeingEvent and WellbeingResponse Objects to cater for “groups” of students/people
HouseholdContactInfo/PreferenceNumber changed to Optional
Other minor typos, broken links and various descriptions updated
WellbeingAlert/WellbeingStartDate changed to Optional
Updates to codesets for Visa SubClass, Federal Electorates, ISO currency names.
